title: Kinematics
description: The kinematic state of the vessel, given in a right-handed, body-fixed coordinate system

vx.title: Velocity in x-direction
vx.description: X-component of linear velocity [m/s], positive forward

vy.title: Velocity in y-direction
vy.description: Y-component of linear velocity [m/s], positive to starboard

vz.title: Velocity in z-direction
vz.description: Z-component of linear velocity [m/s], positive downwards

roll_rate.title: Angular velocity around x-axis
roll_rate.description: X-component of angular velocity [radians/s], positive starboard side down

pitch_rate.title: Angular velocity around y-axis
pitch_rate.description: Y-component of angular velocity [radians/s], positive bow up

yaw_rate.title: Angular velocity around y-axis
yaw_rate.description: Z-component of angular velocity [radians/s], positive bow to starboard
